item.title: Windows
item.description: Using the installer The instaler will have v2ray-core built in. If you need to replace Xray-core, you can manually replace it in the installation directory after installation. Method 1: Install via WinGet WinGet is a package manager launched by Microsoft for Windows 10 and newer operating systems. winget install --id v2raya.win Method 2: Manually run the installer Download the installer for Windows from GitHub Releases , such as installer_windows_x64_1.

item.title: Alpine
item.description: Install V2Ray Core/ Xray Core If you have already installed the core, you can skip this section. Method 1: Install from Package Manager As of Alpine Linux 3.15, V2Ray has entered the Community repo. Edit the apk’s configuration to enable Community feeds: vi /etc/apk/repositories http://dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/alpine/v3.15/main http://dl-cdn.alpinelinux.org/alpine/v3.15/community Then install V2Ray: apk update && apk add v2ray Method 2: Official Script of V2Ray/Xray V2Ray installation reference: https://github.com/v2fly/alpinelinux-install-v2ray Xray installation reference: https://github.

item.title: Arch Linux / Manjaro
item.description: Install V2Ray core / Xray core Install v2ray from official repository, or install xray or xray-bin from AUR. Install v2rayA Just install v2raya or v2raya-bin or v2raya-git from AUR.

item.title: Debian / Ubuntu
item.description: Install V2Ray core / Xray core Official script of V2Ray / Xray V2Ray installation: https://github.com/v2fly/fhs-install-v2ray Xray installation: https://github.com/XTLS/Xray-install Mirror script provided by v2rayA (recommended) curl -Ls https://mirrors.v2raya.org/go.sh | sudo bash You can turn off the service after installation, because v2rayA does not depend on the systemd service. sudo systemctl disable v2ray --now ### Xray needs to replace the service with xray Install v2rayA Method 1: Install through the software source Add public key wget -qO - https://apt.

item.title: OpenWrt
item.description: Install v2rayA via our self-hosted opkg feed (recommended) Please move to v2raya/v2raya-openwrt . Install v2rayA manually Install V2Ray / Xray core Package xray-core is available since OpenWrt 21.02 stable release. First install packages unzip and wget-ssl, then download v2ray-core and move it to /usr/bin/ (precompiled builds can be found in v2ray-core/releases ), and finally give the binary file executable permission. E.g: opkg update; opkg install unzip wget-ssl wget https://github.
